Posts.Content: My consultant said I would , I said I wouldn't !!! As a weight watchers coach I knew I just needed to eat healthily .A tablet won't put the weight on but the increase in your appetite will if you eat to compensate . I'm a great believer in whether you think you can or can't you will be right. Good luck and think positive x
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and weight gain

Posts.Content: Totally agree that different makes of Tamoxifen have different side effects . Mylan is the best one for me and my pharmacist keeps it in for me. It took me along time to work this out !!
Posts.Title: Is there an alternative to Tamoxifen?
